prompts.prompt:
You are an expert AI with live web access. Answer the following user question by searching the web for the most accurate and up-to-date information. Cite your main sources or URLs if available. Be concise but include relevant details.

Question:
###
{query}
###

template.name: ai-websearch-answer
template.title: Websearch answer
template.description: Use AI web access to answer a user query
